summary: This is an email chain from October 2021 regarding the Epstein case, discussing the location of notes and documents from a witness interview conducted in August 2006. The email references an FBI 302 report from an interview on August 22, 2006, and requests notes and documents provided by the witness, as well as notes from an August 15, 2006 interview.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting notes and documents related to witness interviews from 2006. Works at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Witness Interview
events.description: An interview was conducted with a witness, documented in an FBI 302 report. The witness provided a copy of hours worked at Epstein's residence and notes made during employment.

events.title: Witness Interview
events.description: An interview was conducted with a witness, referenced in the email. Notes from this interview are requested.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email references an FBI 302 report from an interview conducted on August 22, 2006.
The witness from the August 22, 2006 interview provided a copy of hours worked at Epstein's residence and notes made during employment.
Notes and documents from the witness are stored under the identifier '31E-MM-108062 â€” GJ 1A4'.
The email also requests notes from an interview conducted on August 15, 2006.
The correspondence is from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York in 2021, indicating ongoing case review or investigation.
